title: Living Colour - Time Tunnel 1990 (HQ VHS Rip)
description:
Living Colour
Time Tunnel (1990)
High Quality VHS Rip

Source:

Original VHS tape > Mitsubishi HS-U748 VCR > S-Video and composite RCA outputs > Game Capture HD > 480i MP4 > HandBrake 0.9.9.5530 (deinterlacing and compression) > 480p M4V

Notes:

This is a high quality H.264 rip of Living Colour's long out of print Time Tunnel VHS, originally released in 1990.  It is a documentary chronicling the band's beginnings, their meteoric rise to fame in the late '80s through the recording of their Time's Up album.  Includes live footage, music videos, and band interviews.  This video is absolute gold for the Living Colour fan.  It includes some priceless footage of the band performing with the Rolling Stones when they opened for them on the Stones' 1989 Steel Wheels tour.

The source is a perfect original VHS tape played back through a Mitsubishi HS-U748 VCR, outputted to a Game Capture HD USB capture device using S-Video and compsite RCA outputs for the audio.
